item.title: Hurricane ISABEL Forecast/Advisory Number 28
item.description:
Issued at 0300Z SAT SEP 13 2003 
ZCZC MIATCMAT3 ALL
TTAA00 KNHC DDHHMM
HURRICANE ISABEL FORECAST/ADVISORY NUMBER  28
NWS TPC/NATIONAL HURRICANE CENTER MIAMI FL   AL132003
0300Z SAT SEP 13 2003
 
HURRICANE CENTER LOCATED NEAR 21.8N  59.5W AT 13/0300Z
POSITION ACCURATE WITHIN  15 NM
 
PRESENT MOVEMENT TOWARD THE WEST OR 275 DEGREES AT   8 KT
 
ESTIMATED MINIMUM CENTRAL PRESSURE  923 MB
EYE DIAMETER  25 NM
MAX SUSTAINED WINDS 140 KT WITH GUSTS TO 170 KT.
64 KT....... 75NE  50SE  50SW  50NW.
50 KT.......100NE  85SE  85SW  85NW.
34 KT.......140NE 120SE 105SW 140NW.
12 FT SEAS..325NE 325SE 250SW 300NW.
WINDS AND SEAS VARY GREATLY IN EACH QUADRANT.  RADII IN NAUTICAL
MILES ARE THE LARGEST RADII EXPECTED ANYWHERE IN THAT QUADRANT.
 
REPEAT...CENTER LOCATED NEAR 21.8N  59.5W AT 13/0300Z
AT 13/0000Z CENTER WAS LOCATED NEAR 21.8N  59.1W
 
FORECAST VALID 13/1200Z 22.2N  60.9W
MAX WIND 135 KT...GUSTS 165 KT.
64 KT... 75NE  60SE  60SW  60NW.
50 KT...100NE  85SE  85SW  85NW.
34 KT...140NE 120SE 105SW 140NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 14/0000Z 22.8N  63.0W
MAX WIND 130 KT...GUSTS 160 KT.
64 KT... 75NE  60SE  60SW  60NW.
50 KT...100NE  85SE  85SW  85NW.
34 KT...140NE 120SE 105SW 140NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 14/1200Z 23.4N  65.1W
MAX WIND 130 KT...GUSTS 160 KT.
64 KT... 75NE  60SE  60SW  60NW.
50 KT...100NE  85SE  85SW  85NW.
34 KT...140NE 120SE 105SW 140NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 15/0000Z 24.0N  67.0W
MAX WIND 130 KT...GUSTS 160 KT.
50 KT...100NE  85SE  85SW  85NW.
34 KT...140NE 120SE 105SW 140NW.
 
FORECAST VALID 16/0000Z 25.0N  70.0W
MAX WIND 125 KT...GUSTS 155 KT.
50 KT...100NE  85SE  85SW  85NW.
34 KT...140NE 120SE 105SW 140NW.
 
EXTENDED OUTLOOK. NOTE...ERRORS FOR TRACK HAVE AVERAGED NEAR 275 NM
ON DAY 4 AND 375 NM ON DAY 5...AND FOR INTENSITY NEAR 20 KT EACH DAY
 
OUTLOOK VALID 17/0000Z 27.0N  72.5W
MAX WIND 115 KT...GUSTS 140 KT.
 
OUTLOOK VALID 18/0000Z 29.5N  74.5W
MAX WIND 105 KT...GUSTS 130 KT.
 
REQUEST FOR 3 HOURLY SHIP REPORTS WITHIN 300 MILES OF 21.8N  59.5W
 
NEXT ADVISORY AT 13/0900Z
 
FORECASTER FRANKLIN
